title: Howling Abyss causes problems for weaker PC's
body:
My PC is running fine, but it tends to easily overheat on games that require a lot of power. On other maps it is fine, but since hollowing has too much doodads and graphics are far higher compared to the other maps, my PC tends to overheat.
Is it possible for Riot to remove/lower the amount of stuff going on in lower settings?

replies.body: While you can lower video settings, I think it's more crucial to first resolve whatever is causing your PC to overheat.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can figure this out with you.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
